English corpus. Structures: word, tag, lempos, pos, lemma, lempos_lc, lemma_lc, lc (word-level). Document-level: doc (attributes: url, title, wiki_categories, urldomain, website, crawl_date, modified_date, tld, wiki_translations, modified_month, modified_year, topic, tld_expl, domain_distance, genre, src, crawl_year), g, s, p (p has heading).

POS tags (TreeTagger v3 + Sketch Engine mods):
- CC: coord conj, CD: card num, CDZ: poss num, DT: det, EX: existential there, FW: foreign, IN: prep/subord conj, IN/that: subordinator "that", JJ: adj, JJR: comp adj, JJS: superl adj, LS: list, MD: modal, NN: noun sing/mass, NNS: noun pl, NNSZ: poss noun pl, NNZ: poss noun sing/mass, NP: prop noun sing, NPS: prop noun pl, NPSZ: poss prop pl, NPZ: poss prop sing, PDT: predet, PP: pers pron, PPZ: poss pron, RB: adv, RBR: comp adv, RBS: superl adv, RP: particle, SENT: sentence end, SYM: symbol, TO: inf "to", UH: interj, VB: be base, VBD: be past, VBG: be gerund, VBN: be past part, VBP: be pres non-3d, VBZ: be 3sg, VH: have base, VHD: have past, VHG: have gerund, VHN: have past part, VHP: have pres non-3d, VHZ: have 3sg, VV: verb base, VVD: verb past, VVG: verb gerund, VVN: verb past part, VVP: verb pres non-3d, VVZ: verb 3sg, WDT: wh-det, WP: wh-pron, WPZ: poss wh-pron, WRB: wh-adv, Z: poss ending.

Lempos suffixes: adj: -j, adv: -a, conj: -c, noun: -n, numeral: -m, prep: -i, pron: -d, verb: -v.

Word sketch relations (use "%w" for node): "%w" and/or...; "%w" is a...; %w's...; -ing objects; ...is a "%w"; adj predicates; adj after; adj modified by; adv modified by; as reflexive; complements; in passive; inf objects; it's "%w" to...; modifiers; nouns modified by; objects (incl. specific particles: across, along, apart, around, aside, away, down, in, off, on, open, out, over, through, unto, up, upon, whole); particles after; particles after with object; possessors; prep phrases; pron objects; pron possessors; pron subjects; subjects; subjects of "be %w"; verbs before; verbs complemented by; verbs modified by; verbs with "%w" as object/subject; verbs with particle + "%w" object (all particles listed); wh-words following.

Key quirks:
- Possessives: Saxon genitive tokenized as part of preceding word (tags: Z, CDZ, NNZ, NNSZ, NPZ, NPSZ, PPZ, WPZ).
- "to" tagged as IN (prep) or TO (inf marker).
- "a/an" lemmatized as "a".
- Tokenizer handles hashtags, user handles, emojis.
- Sentence detection optimized for quotes.
preloaded/cstenten_all_mj2:
**Corpus Summary for CQL Querying (Czech Language)**

**Structures & Attributes:**
- `word`: word form
- `tag`: full POS tag
- `lempos`: lemma + POS suffix (e.g., "lemma-n" for nouns)
- `gender_lemma`: lemma with gender info
- `lc`: lowercase word
- `lempos_lc`: lowercase lempos
- `lemma`: base lemma
- `lemma_lc`: lowercase lemma
- `k`, `g`, `n`, `c`, `p`, `m`, `pos`: atomic POS attributes  
- `s`: unspecified structure  
- `p.heading`: heading attribute  
- `doc` with attributes: `url`, `title`, `urldomain`, `website`, `crawl_date`, `tld`, `topic`, `src`, `genre`  

**POS Annotations (regex patterns):**  
- Noun: `k1.*`  
- Adjective: `k2.*`  
- Pronoun: `k3.*`  
- Numeral: `k4.*`  
- Verb: `k5.*`  
- Adverb: `k6.*`  
- Preposition: `k7.*`  
- Conjunction: `k8.*`  

**Lempos Suffixes:**  
- Noun: `-n` | Adj: `-j` | Pron: `-d` | Num: `-m`  
- Verb: `-v` | Adv: `-a` | Prep: `-p` | Conj: `-c`  

**Word Sketch Relations:**  
Subjects/objects (e.g., "subjects of '%w'", "accusative objects of '%w'"), modifiers (e.g., "modified by '%w'"), positional (e.g., "nouns before '%w'"), passive constructions (e.g., "passive verbs with '%w' as subject"), prepositional phrases. Full list includes 30+ relations like genitive/dative objects, infinitives, locale, etc.  

**Tagset Key Points (Critical for CQL):**  
- **Fixed attribute order:** `kegncpamdxytzw~` (must preserve sequence in regex).  
  Example: Feminine singular instrumental adjective = `[tag="k2.*gFnSc7.*"]` (correct order). `gFnSc7` wrong if rearranged.  
- **Core Attributes:**  
  - `k`: POS (e.g., `k1`=noun, `k5`=verb)  
  - `g`: Gender (`gM`=animate masc, `gI`=inanimate masc, `gF`=fem, `gN`=neuter)  
  - `n`: Number (`nS`=singular, `nP`=plural)  
  - `c`: Case (`c1`=nom, `c2`=gen, `c3`=dat, `c4`=acc, `c6`=loc, `c7`=ins)  
  - `p`: Person (`p1`/`p2`/`p3`)  
  - `a`: Aspect (verbs: `aP`=perfect, `aI`=imperfect)  
  - `d`: Degree (adj/adv: `d1`=positive, `d2`=comparative)  
  - `m`: Verb form (`mF`=infinitive, `mI`=present, `mN`=passive participle)  
- **Subcategories:**  
  - Pronouns: `xP`=personal, `yQ`=interrogative  
  - Numerals: `xC`=cardinal, `xO`=ordinal  
  - Adverbs: `tM`=manner, `tL`=place  
  - Conjunctions: `xC`=coordinating, `xS`=subordinating  

**Quirks:**  
- Negation: `eN` (negative) vs. `eA` (affirmative) in verbs/adjectives.  
- Stylistic flags (e.g., `wH`=colloquial, `wZ`=obsolete) may appear in tags.  
- Punctuation: `kI` with subtypes (e.g., `x.`=.!?).  

**CQL Tips:**  
- Use regex with `tag` respecting attribute order (e.g., `[tag="k5.*nP.*"]` for plural verbs).  
- Lempos queries: `[lempos=".*-v"]` for all verbs.  
- Doc metadata: `[doc.genre="news"]` or `[doc.urldomain="cnn.com"]`.
preloaded/cstenten23_mj2:
**Corpus Summary for CQL Queries (Czech Language)**  

**Core Structures & Attributes:**  
- Token-level: `word` (surface), `tag` (full POS tag), `lempos` (lemma + POS suffix), `lemma`, `gender_lemma`, `lc` (lowercase word), `lemma_lc`, `lempos_lc`, `gender_lemma_lc`.  
- Grammatical attributes (as standalone structures): `k` (POS), `g` (gender), `n` (number), `c` (case), `p` (person), `m` (verb form).  
- Document-level: `doc` with metadata: `url`, `title`, `wiki_categories`, `urldomain`, `website`, `crawl_date`, `modified_date`, `wiki_translations`, `modified_month`, `tld`, `modified_year`, `topic`, `domain_distance`, `genre`, `src`, `crawl_year`.  
- Text structure: `p` (paragraph) with `heading`, `s` (section), `g` (group).  

**POS Annotations & Lempos Suffixes:**  
- **POS regex patterns**:  
  `noun: k1.*`, `adj: k2.*`, `pron: k3.*`, `num: k4.*`, `verb: k5.*`, `adv: k6.*`, `prep: k7.*`, `conj: k8.*`.  
- **Lempos suffixes**:  
  Noun: `-n`, Adj: `-j`, Pron: `-d`, Num: `-m`, Verb: `-v`, Adv: `-a`, Prep: `-p`, Conj: `-c`.  

**Tagset Key (Order-Sensitive: `kegncpamdxytzw~`):**  
- `k`: POS (e.g., `k1`=noun, `k5`=verb).  
- `e`: Negation (`eA`=affirmative, `eN`=negative).  
- `g`: Gender (`gM`=anim masc, `gI`=inan masc, `gN`=neuter, `gF`=fem, `gR`=surname).  
- `n`: Number (`nS`=singular, `nP`=plural).  
- `c`: Case (`c1`=nom, `c2`=gen, `c3`=dat, `c4`=acc, `c5`=voc, `c6`=loc, `c7`=inst).  
- `p`: Person (`p1/2/3`).  
- `a`: Verb aspect (`aP`=perfect, `aI`=imperfect).  
- `m`: Verb form (`mF`=infinitive, `mI`=present, `mN`=passive participle).  
- `d`: Degree (`d1/2/3`=pos/comp/superl).  
- `w`: Stylistic flag (e.g., `wH`=colloquial, `wB`=poetic).  
- *Subclassifications*: e.g., pronouns (`xP`=personal), verbs (`mR`=imperative), adverbs (`tM`=manner).  

**CQL Quirks:**  
- Tag regex must follow attribute order (e.g., `[tag="k2.*gFnSc7"]` for fem/sing/inst adj).  
- Lempos = lemma + suffix (e.g., `[lempos="číst-v"]` for verb "číst").  
- Use `lc`/`lemma_lc` for case-insensitive searches.  

**Word Sketch Relations (Sample):**  
- Subjects/objects: `subjects of "%w"`, `verbs with "%w" as accusative object`.  
- Modifiers: `modified by "%w"`, `nouns modified by "%w"`.  
- Positional: `words before "%w"`, `nouns after "%w"`.  
- Prepositional: `prepositional phrases`, `locale objects of "%w"`.  

**Document Metadata Filters:**  
- Use `doc.attr` in CQL (e.g., `[doc.genre="news"]`, `[doc.modified_year="2020"]`).  

*(Summary preserves all technical details for CQL construction, including tag structure, attributes, and query patterns.)*
preloaded/europarl7_cs:
**Corpus Summary for CQL Querying (Czech Language)**

### **Structures & Attributes**
- **Token-level**: `word`, `tag` (full POS tag), `lempos` (lemma + POS suffix), `gender_lemma`, `lc` (lowercase word), `lempos_lc`, `lemma`, `lemma_lc`, `k` (POS code), `g` (gender), `n` (number), `c` (case), `p` (person), `m` (verb form).  
- **Document-level**:  
  - `s` (id), `p` (id),  
  - `speaker` (name, id, language),  
  - `document` (id, wordcount),  
  - `chapter` (id).  

### **POS Tags (Regex Patterns)**
- Noun: `k1.*`  
- Adjective: `k2.*`  
- Pronoun: `k3.*`  
- Numeral: `k4.*`  
- Verb: `k5.*`  
- Adverb: `k6.*`  
- Preposition: `k7.*`  
- Conjunction: `k8.*`  
- Particle: `k9`  
- Interjection: `k0`  

### **Lempos Suffixes**
- Noun: `-n`  
- Adjective: `-j`  
- Pronoun: `-d`  
- Numeral: `-m`  
- Verb: `-v`  
- Adverb: `-a`  
- Preposition: `-p`  
- Conjunction: `-c`  
- Interjection: `-i`  

### **Tagset Attributes (Fixed Order: `kegncpamdxytzw~`)**
- **`k` (POS)**: `k1` (noun), `k2` (adj), `k3` (pron), `k4` (num), `k5` (verb), etc.  
- **`e` (negation)**: `eA` (affirmative), `eN` (negative).  
- **`g` (gender)**: `gM` (masc animate), `gI` (masc inanimate), `gF` (fem), `gN` (neut), `gR` (surname).  
- **`n` (number)**: `nS` (singular), `nP` (plural).  
- **`c` (case)**: `c1` (nom), `c2` (gen), `c3` (dat), `c4` (acc), `c5` (voc), `c6` (loc), `c7` (instr).  
- **`p` (person)**: `p1/2/3` (1st/2nd/3rd).  
- **`a` (aspect)**: `aP` (perfect), `aI` (imperfect).  
- **`m` (verb form)**: `mF` (infinitive), `mI` (present), `mR` (imperative), etc.  
- **`d` (degree)**: `d1/2/3` (positive/comparative/superlative).  
- **`w` (stylistic)**: `wH` (conversational), `wR` (rare), `wZ` (obsolete), etc.  
- **Sub-POS (e.g., pronouns)**: `xP` (personal), `yQ` (interrogative).  
- **Quirk**: Attributes **must follow canonical order** (e.g., `k2.*gFnSc7.*` for fem/sing/instr adj; `k1gN.*` for neuter nouns).  

### **Word Sketch Relations**
- Objects: accusative/dative/genitive/instrumental/locale/infinitive objects of "%w".  
- Modifiers: modified by "%w", modifiers of "%w".  
- Positional: nouns/verbs/words before/after "%w".  
- Subjects: subjects of (passive) "%w", passive verbs with "%w" as subject.  
- Prepositional phrases, numbers before "%w".  

---  
*Total characters: 1991*

**Corpus Summary for CQL (Czech Language):**  

**Structures & Attributes:**  
- Token-level: `word`, `tag`, `lempos`, `gender_lemma`, `lemma`, `lc` (lowercase word), `lemma_lc`, `lempos_lc`, `k`, `g`, `n`, `c`, `p`, `m`, `pos`.  
- Document-level (`doc`): `source_url`, `url_access_time`, `date`, `date_year_month`, `date_day`, `date_year`, `date_month`, `chamber`.  
- Other: `g`, `s`, `p` (with `name`), `speaker` (with `name`), `note` (with `type`).  

**POS Tags (Regex Patterns):**  
- Noun: `k1.*`  
- Adj: `k2.*`  
- Pronoun: `k3.*`  
- Numeral: `k4.*`  
- Verb: `k5.*`  
- Adverb: `k6.*`  
- Prep: `k7.*`  
- Conj: `k8.*`  

**Lempos Suffixes:**  
- Noun: `-n`  
- Adj: `-j`  
- Pronoun: `-d`  
- Numeral: `-m`  
- Verb: `-v`  
- Adverb: `-a`  
- Prep: `-p`  
- Conj: `-c`  

**Tag Structure & Quirks:**  
- Tags follow fixed order: `kegncpamdxytzw~` (e.g., gender `g` before number `n`).  
- Key attributes:  
  - Gender (`g`): `M` (animate masc), `I` (inanimate masc), `N` (neuter), `F` (fem).  
  - Number (`n`): `S` (sg), `P` (pl).  
  - Case (`c`): `1` (nom), `2` (gen), `3` (dat), `4` (acc), `5` (voc), `6` (loc), `7` (instr).  
  - Negation (`e`): `A` (affirmative), `N` (negative).  
  - Stylistic flags (`w`): e.g., `wH` (conversational), `wB` (poetic).  
- Sub-POS details (e.g., verb aspect `aP`/`aI`, pronoun type `xP`/`xD`).  

**Word Sketch Relations:**  
Include: subjects/objects (accusative, dative, genitive, etc.), modifiers (e.g., "modified by %w"), prepositions (e.g., "prepositional phrases"), passive constructions (e.g., "passive verbs with %w as subject"), positional relations (e.g., "words before %w").  

**CQL Notes:**  
- Use regex in `[tag="..."]` respecting attribute order (e.g., `[tag="k2.*gFnSc7.*"]` for fem sg instr adjectives).  
- Lempos combines lemma + suffix (e.g., `lemma + "-n"` for nouns).  
- Stylistic flags (`w`) apply broadly; negation (`e`) for verbs/adjs/advs.

English corpus. Token structures: word, tag, lempos, pos, lemma, lempos_lc, lemma_lc, lc. Document structures: g, s, p (with heading attribute), doc (with attributes: url, title, urldomain, feed, website, tld, date, city, country, month, quarter, topic, year, genre).  

POS annotations (regex patterns):  
adjective: J.*, adverb: RB.?, conjunction: CC, determiner: DT, noun: N.*, numeral: CD, particle: RP, preposition: IN, pronoun: PP.?, verb: V.*.  

Lempos suffixes:  
adjective: -j, adverb: -a, conjunction: -c, noun: -n, preposition: -i, pronoun: -d, verb: -v.  

Word sketch relations:  
%w and/or ..., %w's ..., -ing objects of "%w", ... is a "%w", adjective predicates of "%w", adjectives after "%w", adjectives modified by "%w", adverbs modified by "%w", as reflexive, complements of "%w", in passive, infinitive objects of "%w", it's "%w" to ..., modifiers of "%w", nouns modified by "%w", objects of "%w" with particles (across, along, apart, around, aside, away, down, in, off, on, open, out, over, through, unto, up, upon, whole), particles after "%w", particles after "%w" with object, possessors of "%w", prepositional phrases, pronominal objects/possessors/subjects of "%w", subjects of "%w"/"be %w", verbs before "%w", verbs complemented/modified by "%w", verbs with "%w" as object/subject, verbs with particle + "%w" as object (all particles listed), wh-words following "%w".  

Tagset quirks:  
TreeTagger v3 with Sketch Engine mods. Possessives as single tokens (tags: NNZ, NNSZ, NPZ, NPSZ, CDZ). "to" tagged as IN (preposition) or TO (infinitive). Indefinite articles lemmatized as "a". Tokenization handles hashtags/handles/emojis (tagged SYM). Sentence breaks: SENT. Possessive endings: Z.

**Corpus Summary for CQL Queries (French)** **Token Attributes (per word):** - `word`: surface form - `lc`: lowercase word - `lemma`: base form - `lemma_lc`: lowercase lemma - `tag`: full POS tag (FreeLing/EAGLES tagset) - `shorttag`: abbreviated POS - `pos`: coarse POS (e.g., "noun") - `lempos`: lemma + POS suffix (e.g., *chat-n* for noun) - `lempos_lc`: lowercase lempos - `gender_lemma`: lemma with gender - `gender_guess`: inferred gender - `number_guess`: inferred number - `tags`: composed tag - `morphemes`: morphological segments **Document/Structural Attributes:** - `doc` (metadata): url, title, wiki_categories, urldomain, website, crawl_date, modified_date, tld, wiki_translations, modified_month, modified_year, topic, domain_distance, genre, crawl_year, src - `p` (paragraph): heading, lang_diff - `g`, `s`: structural elements **Lempos Suffixes (lemma + suffix):** - Noun: `-n` - Verb: `-v` - Adjective: `-j` - Adverb: `-r` - Pronoun: `-p` - Preposition: `-i` - Conjunction: `-c` - Numeral: `-m` **Word Sketch Relations:** Subjects/objects: *subjects of "%w"*, *objects of "%w"*, *verbs with "%w" as subject*, *pronominal subjects/objects* Modifiers: *modifiers of "%w"*, *adjectives after "%w"*, *noun modifiers* Verbal chains: *aller/devoir/pouvoir/venir de "%w"*, *être en train de "%w"*, *subjects of "être %w"* Other: *prepositional phrases*, *with_definite_article*, *infinitive objects*, *comparatives (more/less "%w" than...)* **POS Tagset (FreeLing):** - **Tag structure**: Positional (e.g., `N.FS.*` = feminine singular noun). Use `[tag="..."]` in CQL. - **Key POS (position 0)**: - `N` (noun): type (C=common, P=proper), gender (F/M/C/N), number (S/P/N) - `V` (verb): mood (I=indicative, N=infinitive), tense (P=present, F=future), person (1/2/3), number (S/P) - `A` (adjective): type (Q=qualificative), gender, number - `D` (determiner): type (A=article, D=demonstrative), gender, number - `P` (pronoun): type (P=personal), case (N=nominative, A=accusative) - `R` (adverb), `S` (preposition), `C` (conjunction), `Z` (numeral), `I` (interjection) - **Punctuation**: Non-positional (e.g., `Fc`=comma, `Fp`=period). **CQL Tips:** - Use `.*` for wildcards (e.g., `[tag="N.FS.*"]` for all feminine singular nouns). - Lempos queries: `[lempos=".*-n"]` for all nouns. - Metadata: Restrict searches with `doc`/`p` attributes (e.g., `within

`). - Tag quirks: Gender/number vary by POS; verb tags encode mood/tense/person.
preloaded/europarl7_en:
**Corpus Summary for CQL Querying (English)**  

**Structures & Attributes:**  
- Token-level: `word`, `tag` (POS), `lempos` (lemma+POS suffix), `lemma`, `lemma_lc` (lowercase lemma), `lc` (lowercase word).  
- Hierarchical: `s` (sentence; `id`), `p` (paragraph; `id`), `speaker` (attributes: `name`, `id`, `language`), `chapter` (`id`), `document` (`id`, `wordcount`).  
- Global: `g` (unspecified).  

**POS Annotations (Regex Patterns):**  
- `adjective`: `J.*` (e.g., JJ, JJR)  
- `adverb`: `RB.?`  
- `conjunction`: `CC`  
- `determiner`: `DT`  
- `noun`: `N.*` (e.g., NN, NNS, NP, NPS)  
- `numeral`: `CD`  
- `particle`: `RP`  
- `preposition`: `IN`  
- `pronoun`: `PP.?`  
- `verb`: `V.*` (e.g., VB/VH/VV + tense forms)  

**Lempos Suffixes:**  
- Adjective: `-j`  
- Adverb: `-a`  
- Conjunction: `-c`  
- Noun: `-n`  
- Preposition: `-i`  
- Pronoun: `-p`  
- Verb: `-v`  

**Word Sketch Relations:**  
Core relations: `subject`, `object`, `modifier`, `predicate`, `and/or`, `passive`, `reflexive`, `wh_comp`.  
- Particle verbs: `part_*` (e.g., `part_up-x`, `part_off-x_obj`).  
- Prepositional phrases: `pp_*`/`pp_obj_*` (e.g., `pp_on-i`, `pp_obj_with-i`).  
- Adjectival: `adj_comp`, `adj_subject_of`.  
- Possession: `possessor`, `possessed`.  
- Verb-specific: `infin_comp`, `ing_comp`.  

**Key Tagset Quirks for CQL:**  
- **Verb distinctions**: `VB` (be-base), `VH` (have-base), `VV` (other verbs).  
- **Proper nouns**: `NP` (singular), `NPS` (plural).  
- **"to"**: `IN` (preposition) vs. `TO` (infinitive marker).  
- **Punctuation**: `SENT` (sentence-ending: `.`, `!`, `?`).  
- **Pronouns**: `PP` (personal), `PPZ` (possessive).  
- **TreeTagger+SkE differences**: Tags like `NP`/`NPS` replace `NNP`/`NNPS`; `VH`/`VB` split from `VV`.  

**CQL Tips:**  
- Use regex for POS (e.g., `[tag="V.*"]` for all verbs).  
- Lempos combines lemma + suffix (e.g., `run-v` for verb "run").  
- Hierarchical queries: Anchor to `s`, `p`, or `document` via attributes (e.g., `[s.id="xyz"]`).  
- Preposition/particle relations use `pp_*`/`part_*` patterns.  

---  
*Summary retains all technical details for CQL construction, excluding redundant HTML/documentation.*
